resources.string: Change email by receiving a verification code
If you want to change your email, you can do so automatically using a verification code sent to your phone and email.
Use your registered phone number and email to receive a verification code to bind a new email
The original email or phone cannot receive the verification code. Please contact customer service to change your email.
Final step: Verify your new email address
Enter your new email address correctly to receive a verification code
Please enter your new email address
Requirements to be met before updating your email address
Take a selfie holding your passport or ID card
Enter and confirm your new email address
We will verify your information and update your email address
This usually takes 10 minutes, but can take up to 3 days
"We only accept passports, ID cards or driver's licenses for identity verification."
First and last name on your ID
Selfie verification failed. Please upload again
We will verify your information and update your email address. You will be notified of the result via system message or SMS.
This usually takes 10 minutes, but can take up to 3 days
